EmailTemplate.name: New Amission Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: New Admission Created
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This is an automatically generated message from our ESD system.
Hello {!Admission__c.CreatedBy},
You have just set up an Admission record for {!Admission__c.Person_Being_Served__c} in ESD. Please also create the corresponding records in your Billing System.
Thank you.
